subject: Proposal Discussion
notes: Discussed the CRM implementation timeline. Client is interested but has concerns about data migration. Scheduled follow-up for next week.

subject: Contract Documents Sent
notes: Sent final contract documents for review. Client confirmed receipt and will review with legal team by end of week.

subject: Enterprise Demo Meeting
notes: Conducted product demo focusing on enterprise features. Attendees were impressed with scalability options. Next step: technical requirements gathering.

subject: Discovery Call
notes: Initial discovery call completed. Startup is looking for basic package to start. Budget confirmed at $12k. Good fit for our starter plan.

subject: Project Kickoff Confirmation
notes: Confirmed project kickoff meeting scheduled for next week. Sent agenda and team introduction materials.

subject: Marketing Strategy Discussion
notes: Discussed their marketing analytics needs. They need advanced reporting features. Preparing custom proposal.

subject: Technical Requirements Call
notes: Discussed integration requirements with their existing fintech stack. Complex integration needed. Scheduling technical architect call.

subject: Proposal Feedback Review
notes: Received feedback on proposal. They need additional security features for healthcare compliance. Preparing revised proposal.

subject: Data Migration Plan
notes: Created detailed data migration plan for TechCorp. Includes timeline, resources needed, and risk mitigation strategies.

subject: Contract Terms Discussion
notes: Client requested changes to payment terms. Discussed options for quarterly vs annual billing. Prefer quarterly for cash flow.
